DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate impact implement universal pulse oximeter screen way detect critical congenital heart disease otherwise well-appearing newborn .
DOC.brief_title: The Impact Implementing Universal Newborn Screening Critical Congenital Heart Disease
DOC.criteria: 1 . Documentation inform consent authorization . 2 . Full term late preterm newborn ( EGA 3544 week ) 3 . On room air 4 . Neonates know congenital heart defect time screening , e.g. , antenatal diagnosis diagnosis within first 24 hour birth 5 . Parents agree followup contact post discharge 1 . On supplemental oxygen 2 . Admitted Neonatal Intensive Care Unit 3 . Parents agree followup 4 . Greater 30 day age
